author: tersec
content: that's after restarting to clear out any vestigial memory of past invalids. Will check again once the ELs have been updated

author: pawandhananjay
content: just to clarify, the error condition here also applies to engine_getPayload right? https://github.com/ethereum/execution-apis/pull/623 cc <@425572898787426305>

author: nc1234
content: Yea I think so. It wouldnt make sense to have say two lists of consolidation requests. Lodestar automatically rejects payload from getPayload if the order of elements is not in _strictly_ ascending order.

author: tersec
content: it would probably be good to add this to the specs explicitly though

author: jochembrouwer
content:
Hi devops, could all (I think its only one: teku-ethjs) ethjs clients be restarted? Using this branch: `devnet5-excessgas-fix` and this commit: `573f023a6dae0238bb7b90405595a6671b616d3d`

We at EthJS actually implemented the fork transition wrong ðŸ™‚ Which is why we never came further than the fork block (it was 127 or 128) ðŸ˜…
